name: projax-prxi
description: Terminal UI for projax project dashboard

scripts.build: esbuild src/index.tsx --bundle --platform=node --outfile=dist/index.temp.mjs --external:projax-core --external:react-devtools-core --format=esm && (echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' && cat dist/index.temp.mjs) > dist/index.mjs && rm dist/index.temp.mjs && chmod +x dist/index.mjs
